dcterms:creator: Nikolaus Mayer
Eddy Ilg
Philip Hausser
Philipp Fischer
Daniel Cremers
Alexey Dosovitskiy
Thomas Brox
dcterms:description: A synthetic stereo collection that provides 35,454 and 4,370 image pairs for training and testing, respectively. The dataset has a resolution of 960Ã—540 and uses dense disparity maps as ground truth. It is split into two categories: cleanpass and finalpass.
dcterms:title: SceneFlow

dcterms:creator: Andreas Geiger
Philip Lenz
Raquel Urtasun
dcterms:description: A dataset captured from real-world scenes, containing 194 and 195 image pairs for training and testing, respectively. It provides sparse ground-truth disparities guided by the LiDAR system.
dcterms:title: KITTI 2012

dcterms:creator: Moritz Menze
Andreas Geiger
dcterms:description: A dataset that provides two sets with 200 image pairs for training and testing, offering sparse ground-truth disparities guided by the LiDAR system.
dcterms:title: KITTI 2015
